original_text: I may try to be happy and to smile. I may try to forget about my troubles. I may try to be happy and to smile. I may try to forget about my troubles. I may try to be happy and to smile.
korean_text: 가령 내가 말하기를 내 불평을 잊고 얼굴 빛을 고쳐 즐거운 모양을 하자 할지라도

sentences.original_text: I may try to be happy
I may try to forget about my troubles
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 고민을 잊으려고 노력할 수 있습니다
